mapper.insert: insert into QnABoard values(QnABoard_SEQ.nextval, #{infoQnA_type}, #{infoQnA_subject}, #{infoQnA_userID}, #{infoQnA_orderNum}, #{infoQnA_email}, #{infoQnA_phone}, #{infoQnA_content}, #{infoQnA_imageName}, sysdate, 0, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from QnABoard order by infoQnA_seq desc)tt)where rn>=#{startNum} and rn<=#{endNum}
mapper.insert: insert into information values(information_SEQ.nextval, #{information_subject}, #{information_name}, sysdate, 0, nvl(#{information_imageName},0), #{information_content})
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from information order by information_number desc)tt)where rn>=#{startNum} and rn<=#{endNum}
select count(*) from information where ${searchOption} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
